game.name: Webbed
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Swing through the trees, spin sticky webs, and make friends with bugs! Be the adorable spider you've always wanted to be.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Swing through the trees, spin sticky webs, and make friends with bugs! Be the adorable spider you've always wanted to be.

reviewHighlights.text: Adorable game with some of the most fun movement mechanics I've ever seen! Cute story, cute spiders, and a lot of creative freedom with the different...
still haven't beaten the game, just been swinging around the skatepark instead
